title.native: 愚かな天使は悪魔と踊る
title.romaji: Oroka na Tenshi wa Akuma to Odoru
title.english: The Foolish Angel Dances with the Devil

description:
Determined to protect his demon world from heavenly angels, demon Masatora Akutsu heads to earth in search of a charismatic human to rally his kin. Masquerading as a high schooler for his recruitment mission, he’s captivated by the lovely Lily Amane. But he’s in for a wild celestial surprise, because she’s his archnemesis—an angel—and she’s set on reforming his demonic ways!

(Source: Crunchyroll)
hashtag: #かな天 #kanaten #愚かな天使は悪魔と踊る
synonyms: Stupid angel dances with the devil

tags.name: Angels
tags.description: Prominently features spiritual beings usually represented with wings and halos and believed to be attendants of God.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Urban Fantasy
tags.description: Set in a world similar to the real world, but with the existence of magic or other supernatural elements.

tags.name: Tsundere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who acts cold and hostile in order to mask warmer emotions.

title.native: 愚かな天使は悪魔と踊る

node.description: He is an art director and supervisor, who was a long time member of Bihou until 2007 when he went to head the background art department in Totonyan. He belongs to the anime production group Neko-Nanban-Tei together with director Watanabe Takashi and his wife Miyata Naomi.

Freelancer. Recognizable for his bassy and often reverbed sound effects.

Regularly works with [Yoshikazu Iwanami](https://anilist.co/staff/101016/) and [Jin Aketagawa](https://anilist.co/staff/103074/).

__Height:__ 153cm

[Profile (Style Cube)](http://stylecube.jp/talents/kaori/index.html) | [Website](http://ishiharakaori.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kaori_staff_) | [Blog](http://ameblo.jp/ishiharakaori/) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/ishiharakaori_official) | [TikTok](https://www.tiktok.com/@kaori_ishihara)

She won the award of Best Rookie Actress in the 7th Seiyuu Awards. She was a founding member of the group [StylipS](https://anilist.co/staff/111177), before her graduation from the group on April 20, 2013. She was one half of J-Pop duo [YuiKaori](https://anilist.co/staff/195974/), along with [Yui Ogura](https://anilist.co/staff/105981/) before the group disbanded in 2017.

__Non-anime roles:__
- Frima - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)
- Soldier EG - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)
- Tiara - Fairy Fencer F (VG)

Pop idol group affiliated with Pony Canyon.

__Members:__
Shizuku Ameshima (雨島詩月)
Anri Enomiya (榎宮あんり)
Mio Mitsuha (三葉海緒)
Julia Yuzuki (夕綺友里杏)

Pop idol group affiliated with Pony Canyon.

__Members:__
Mayu Aoi (蒼生茉由)
Hiyori Nagira (凪楽ひより)
Hazuki Nonose (野々瀬葉月)
Nodoka Hasumi (羽澄和奏)
Kao Hanasaki (花咲花桜)

__[Twitter](https://twitter.com/watanabesho)__ | __[Blog (jp)](https://ameblo.jp/shoooou/)__ | __[Artist Profile (Smile Company)](https://www.smile-co.jp/archives/creator/431)__

Shou Watanabe is a Japanese keyboardist, lyricist, composer, arranger and member of three-piece rock band [Sajou no Hana](https://anilist.co/staff/137163/).

__[Twitter](https://twitter.com/watanabesho)__ | __[Blog (jp)](https://ameblo.jp/shoooou/)__ | __[Artist Profile (Smile Company)](https://www.smile-co.jp/archives/creator/431)__

Shou Watanabe is a Japanese keyboardist, lyricist, composer, arranger and member of three-piece rock band [Sajou no Hana](https://anilist.co/staff/137163/).

[Profile (F.M.F)](http://www.fmf-music.com/members/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/eba_cadode) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/eba_1987_/)

Eba is a Japanese music producer, guitarist, composer, arranger and member of pop unit [cadode](https://twitter.com/cadode_). He is also affiliated with F.M.F Corporation.

_Note: Not to be confused with the vocalist and lyricist with the same name [Hirokazu Ebata aka Eba](https://anilist.co/staff/161178)_
Inaba Emi (稲葉エミ) is a lyricist and has taken part in the project Solua.
**Shuuhei Yanagidate** is a Japanese lyricist, composer and arranger affiliated with F.M.F Corporation.

__[Website](https://www.yukinara.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/Yuki_Nara_217) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/yukinara217/)__

__Yuuki Nara__ is a Japanese guitarist, lyricist, composer and arranger affiliated with F.M.F Corporation.
**Shuuhei Yanagidate** is a Japanese lyricist, composer and arranger affiliated with F.M.F Corporation.
